article.title: Feasability of constraining the curvature parameter of the symmetry energy using elliptic flow data

multiple_choice_question.text: Which value of the wave function width LN is able to reasonably describe both the central density and rms of a realistic density profile for the 197Au nucleus?
Which cluster species shows the strongest dependence on the momentum-space coalescence parameter (δp)?
For which cluster species does the multiplicity NOT show a monotonic dependence on the stiffness of the symmetry energy?
Which observable exhibits the strongest sensitivity to variations in the stiffness parameter xMDI?
choices: All three observables are equally sensitive

multiple_choice_question.text: At what projectile kinetic energy does the sensitivity of npEFR to the curvature parameter Ksym reach its maximum?
Which quantity is directly related to the isospin dependent component of nuclear matter compressibility (Kτ)?
choices: Skewness parameter of isospin symmetric matter (J0)
